title: The strangest careers you've never heard of
text: A further update on new job opportunities: Go-ahead London borough requires technicians to paint random mystifying symbols and marks at intervals along pavements. It also has vacancies for eight qualified cone wardens. You too could be a cone warden (Alamy) The National Selfie Gallery is looking for an organiser of major prestige exhibitions. Tweet CV to Trustees, but do NOT send photo. Major Rail Company is proposing to appoint a Senior Apologies Executive running a hard-working team of sincere regretters. The salary will be £340,00, plus a generous Remorse Bonus. Exciting opportunities in showbusiness: expanding celebrity agency is now recruiting mystery blondes. The job involves being photographed outside nightclubs in the company of leading c-listers. Some previous experience in canoodling an advantage. Or would you prefer a career as a concerned friend? You will be required to look out for female celebrities showing signs “dramatic weight loss” and to report your anxieties to the tabloids. There are also work experience openings for well-wishers to stand outside magistrates courts when pop stars are charged with drugs offences. Diversity skills development team seeks inclusiveness enablers in its transparency resource unit. All applications will be treated in strictest confidence. Measuring the powder in a cornflakes box could be your vocation (Geoff Pugh) We are one of the country’s leading recruitment agencies and we have hundred of trolls on our books who are looking for nice people to be their paid companions. Experienced crumblers (with Advanced Pulverisation Diploma) are sought by breakfast cereal manufacturers. You will be responsible for ensuring that there is a sufficient volume of powdery cornflake fragments at the bottom of every one of our cereal packets. Scope for promotion to the position of senior disintegration officer in our lively muesli department with a chance to be selected as chief raisin remover. All Souls College, Oxford , has a vacancy for a tattooist-in-residence. Arsenal supporter preferred. Follow @telegoodlife
